title: Known Gallery : Letters First : Royal Elastics The Seventh Letter
content:
While perusing my gallery of design elements and came across this pic:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827234225im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/8337_digitalUnderground_4636.jpg)

so I went off to google the seventh letter crew and found this:  
 [http://www.knowngallery.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827234225/http:/www.knowngallery.com/ "http://www.knowngallery.com/")

Cool site with graph artist stuff and much more besides. Sheppard Fairey and Banksy etc.

 [‹ new fonts releases newsletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827234225/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28820 "Go to previous forum topic") [Top 3 must have books on typography\_? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827234225/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28754 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j_polo9
